mapper.sql: id, districtandcounty, enodeb, cellname, localcellid, cgi, tac, pci, mod3, longitude, latitude, cellpower, electronictiltangle, mechanicaltiltangle, totaldowntiltangle, azimuth, antennaheight, devicestatus, managestatus, coveragetype, coverscene, cellbandwidth, workfrequencyband, carrierffrequencynum, carrierffrequencycount, maintenancedepartment, vendor, grid, address, interdimensionalstate, ltebasestationlocalname, coverdistance, halfpowerangle
mapper.select: SET group_concat_max_len = 1024000; select carrierffrequencynum as earfcn,pci,count(cgi) as nums, GROUP_CONCAT(CONCAT_WS(':',id,longitude,latitude) SEPARATOR ',') as cellidaddr from fourg_gc where carrierffrequencynum=#{earfcn,jdbcType=INTEGER} and pci is not null and longitude is not null and latitude is not null GROUP BY carrierffrequencynum,pci

update fourg_gc
districtandcounty = #{districtandcounty,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
enodeb = #{enodeb,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

cgi = #{cgi,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
tac = #{tac,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pci = #{pci,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
